item.description:
THIS IS MY ALL TIME FAV PLACE TO EAT....BRING YOUR APPITITES AND LAUGHTER CAUSE WE ARE GONNA EAT..WE CAN CAR POOL AS IT IS A LITTLE WAYS AWAY...I WILL PICK A LOCATION TO MEET FROM.




Enjoy a cocktail before your meal in one of our comfortable lounge areas. The Main Lounge, which seats more than two hundred people, has two full bars. In every lounge, experienced, professional bartenders ensure swift service. A Wright's Farm Restaurant Lounge is a great place to meet, greet and enjoy great conversation before you enjoy a great meal.
item.name: WRIGHTS FARM
